mapper.select: SELECT a.sign FROM sys_permission_info a WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND a.`status` = 0 AND LENGTH( a.sign ) > 0 AND EXISTS ( SELECT rp.permission_id FROM sys_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN sys_role_info ri ON ( rp.role_id = ri.id ) WHERE ri.del_flag = 0 AND ri.`status` = 0 AND EXISTS ( SELECT ur.role_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id = ${userId} AND rp.role_id = ur.role_id ) AND a.id = rp.permission_id )
